title: Scientific breakthrough on tree breeding
description: A small group of people from Greece have found out experiementally that breeding specific types of trees allows them to be more reproductive
detailed: In recent years, fires and industrialization have cut down lots of trees. That problem might be solved because a small group of people from greece found out that if you breed red and green trunk oak trees, the produce 2 times more pollen, enough to replant a whole football field in 2 years
